ComicInfo.Title: The Cobra's Venom Part 5
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The Cobra's Venom Part 5: In Shazidar, Cover Girl's team is caught in a gunfight with government forces while Heavy Duty, Airborne and Ripcord try to defend civilians from Green Morning. Meanwhile, Ambush brings Milo to Budo's dojo in San Francisco and Destro raids another Revanche base in Kansas, but is met by the massive Alpha 001 Prime entity.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 08:14:25. [CVDB705364] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:39:27. [Issue ID 1944113]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),James Offredi,Jamie Sullivan,John Royale,Rogier Van de Beek,Ron Joseph
ComicInfo.Characters: Dusty,Long Range,Green Morning Insurgents,Muskrat,Freda,Joystick,Repeater,Alpine],Blue Ninjas [Alpha 001 Prime],Raymond,Mainframe,Iron Grenadiers,Baroness,Ripcord,Leatherneck,Violette,Airborne,Milo,Destro,G.I. Joe [Cover Girl,Heavy Duty,Ambush,Idun
